title: Project Initiation
description: Kickoff the project, gather requirements, and define the project scope and objectives.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, interfaces, data flows, and data models. Consider scalability, security, and performance requirements. Define the roles and responsibilities of each component, as well as the communication protocols and data formats. In addition, outline the strategies for integrating various urban systems such as traffic management, waste collection, and public safety using IoT devices and centralized data analytics. Provide a detailed design document that includes system diagrams and mockups, clearly explain how each component will interact with others in the system, and provide an overview of the system's resilience to ensure seamless operations in case of failures or downtime. Update the document as necessary based on feedback during the review process. Upon completion, this task will serve as a foundation for the subsequent development tasks.

title: IoT Device Integration: Update and Improvements Proposal - Revised
description: This RFC proposes the updated requirements and protocols for integrating IoT devices from various urban systems. The focus remains on ensuring compatibility, security, scalability, and now includes energy efficiency and data privacy considerations in the integration process. The proposal further emphasizes the need for a unified API to facilitate communication between different IoT devices and the central system.

title: User Interface Design for SmartCityOrchestrator
description:
Design a responsive, intuitive, and accessible user interface for monitoring and controlling the integrated urban systems. The UI should provide a centralized dashboard with real-time data visualization, alerts, and control mechanisms. Consider usability, security, and accessibility best practices. Collaborate with frontend-developer to ensure seamless implementation of the design. Ensure the UI is scalable and can handle large amounts of data effectively.

Dependencies: System Architecture Design, Data Visualization Requirements, Accessibility Guidelines for Web Applications (If not yet considered)

Additional Notes: To improve efficiency, consider implementing an interactive interface that allows users to adjust system parameters in real-time. Also, incorporate a feature for generating custom reports.

title: Security and Compliance for SmartCityOrchestrator
description: Define comprehensive security requirements, data privacy policies, and compliance standards for the SmartCityOrchestrator system. Include a detailed analysis of potential risks, proposed mitigation strategies, and ongoing monitoring procedures. Consider integration with existing IT infrastructure and adherence to industry-standard best practices.

title: Infrastructure and Deployment Planning
description: Plan the infrastructure requirements, deployment strategies, and monitoring tools for the SmartCityOrchestrator system. This includes detailing hardware, software, network, and security considerations for a robust, scalable, and secure city-wide IoT deployment. Consider edge computing for real-time data processing, ensure compatibility with existing urban systems, and outline disaster recovery strategies. Also, suggest methods for minimizing latency and optimizing data transfer across the system.
